attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the friends of Javed choudry are all going to USA for a road trip.  we always get together for events such as wrestling and football.  This will be the last time ever we go on a long boys holiday and we need the main man to come with us.  SO people of the UK united to convince him to come with us.  Also Mr Brown please have a word with him and i will vote for you:)

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
